name: dashboard-manager
description: Dashboard Manager para EnelX B2C 2025 - Sistema de gestión de dashboards dinámicos

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build && echo 'Build completado - listo para deployment'

author: WA Contact Center
